use: describing an action currently in progress
hanzi: 她  在  看 书。
explanation: explains that she is reading.

use: expressing an action currently in progress
hanzi: 阿姨  正在  打扫 我们 的 房间。
pinyin: Āyí  zhèngzài  dǎsǎo wǒmen de fángjiān
explanation: explains that the cleaning lady is cleaning our room right now.

use: negating 有
hanzi: 我  没有  问题。
explanation: explains that i don't have any questions.

use: negating the verb hē jiǔ
hanzi: 我们  不   喝  酒。
explanation: explains that we don't drink alcohol.

use: negating the adjective è
hanzi: 我  不   饿 。
explanation: explains that i'm not hungry.

use: used for creating a group out of "they"
hanzi: 他们  都  在 上海 。
explanation: explains that they are all in shanghai.

use: Creating a group out of "us"
hanzi: 我们  都  要 冰水。
explanation: explains that we all want ice water.

use: Used to express that I also like something.
hanzi: 我  也  喜欢。
explanation: explains that i also like it.

use: shows that Hunan food is also spicy.
hanzi: 湖南 菜  也   很  辣。
explanation: explains that hunan food is very spicy too.

use: asking how tall she is
hanzi: 她  多  高？
explanation: explains that how tall is she?

use: express that the house is not too big
hanzi: 我 家  不 太  大。
explanation: explains that my house is not too big.

use: expresses that I don't fully understand
hanzi: 我  不 太  懂 。
explanation: explains that i don't really understand.

use: used to link you and me in a sentence
hanzi: 你   和   我
explanation: explains that you and i

use: express that I will not be home after 3pm
hanzi: 下午 三点   以后 ， 我 不 在 家。
pinyin: Xiàwǔ  sāndiǎn   yǐhòu  wǒ bù zài jiā
explanation: explains that after three p.m., i will not be at home.

use: expressing that after we get off work, we will play ball
hanzi: 下班   以后 你 想 跟 我们 一起 去 打球 吗
pinyin: Xiàbān   yǐhòu  nǐ xiǎng gēn wǒmen yīqǐ qù dǎqiú ma
explanation: explains that after we get off work, would you like to go play ball with us?

use: asks about whether I washed my hands before eating
hanzi: 吃饭   以前  ，你 洗 手 了 吗？
pinyin: Chīfàn   yǐqián  nǐ xǐ shǒu le ma
explanation: explains that did you wash your hands before eating?

use: expressing whether I knew someone before two years
hanzi: 两 年   以前  ， 你 认识 他 吗？
pinyin: Liǎng nián   yǐqián   nǐ rènshi tā ma
explanation: explains that did you know him two years ago?

use: Expressing that something happened yesterday
hanzi: 昨天   我  去 了 酒吧 。
explanation: explains that yesterday i went to the bar.

use: expressing that something happened yesterday
hanzi: 我   昨天  去 了 酒吧 。
explanation: explains that i went to the bar yesterday.

use: used to express my age
hanzi: 我 20  岁  。
explanation: explains that i am 20 years old.

use: used to expressing half time periods
hanzi: 她两岁半。
explanation: explains that she is two and a half years old.

use: counting one person
hanzi: 一  个  人
explanation: explains that one person

structure: number + 年 + number + 月 + number + 号
use: creating a date
pinyin: Yībāliùbā  nián  Yī yuè  shíbā  hào
explanation: explains that january 18, 1868

structure: number + 年 + number + 月 + number + 日
use: creating a date
pinyin: èrlínglíngyī  nián  Qī yuè  èrshí  rì
explanation: explains that july 20th, 2001

use: creating a time
hanzi: 两  点   零  九 分
explanation: explains that 2:09

use: creating a time
hanzi: 九  点
explanation: explains that 9 o'clock

use: Creating the time of day
hanzi: 上午 七  点
explanation: explains that 7 o'clock a.m.

use: talking about a house, which is a close possession
hanzi: 我 家  很 大。
explanation: explains that my house is very big.

use: talking about a brother
hanzi: 你 哥哥  很 高 。
explanation: explains that your big brother is very tall.

use: talking about an action that has completed
hanzi: 他们 到  了  。
explanation: explains that they have arrived.

use: used for talking about an action that is completed
hanzi: 我  今天  吃  了  早饭 。
explanation: explains that this morning i ate breakfast.

use: used for talking about an action that has already happened
hanzi: 中午  我 见  了  朋友 。
explanation: explains that at noon i met a friend.

use: expressing an action that has already completed
hanzi: 上个 月 我 去  台湾   了  。
pinyin: Shàng gè yuè wǒ qù  Táiwān   le
explanation: explains that i went to taiwan last month.

structure: subject + 不 + verb + object + 了
use: used to talk about something that is no longer true
hanzi: 我  不  想 吃  了  。
explanation: explains that i don't want to eat anymore.

use: talking about something that is no longer true
hanzi: 手机  没  电  了  。
explanation: explains that my cell phone has run out of power.

use: talking about something that is no longer true
hanzi: 他  没有  家  了 。
explanation: explains that he doesn't have a home anymore.

use: Expressing that the situation has changed and I'm now 20 years old
hanzi: 我 20 岁  了  ！
explanation: explains that i'm 20 years old now!

use: Expressing that a situation has changed and I'm now leaving
hanzi: 我 走  了  。
explanation: explains that i'm leaving now.

use: expresses that the teacher is mine
hanzi: 我  的  老师
explanation: explains that my teacher

use: repeating a question
hanzi: 你 爸爸 是 上海 人 ，你 妈妈  呢  ？
pinyin: Nǐ bàba shì Shànghǎi rén nǐ māma  ne
explanation: explains that your father is shanghainese. and your mom?

use: soften the expression
hanzi: 这 不 太 好  吧  。
explanation: explains that this isn't so good.

use: express going to the supermarket
hanzi: 妈妈 要  去  超市。
explanation: explains that mom will go to the supermarket.

use: expressing a coming towards
hanzi: 你 现在  来 南京 路 吧。
pinyin: Nǐ xiànzài  lái  Nánjīng Lù ba
explanation: explains that come to nanjing road now.

use: expresses that I'm in shanghai
hanzi: 我  在  上海。
explanation: explains that i'm in shanghai.

use: expresses that there exists puppies in my home
hanzi: 我 家  有  很 多 小 狗。
pinyin: Wǒ jiā  yǒu  hěn duō xiǎo gǒu
explanation: explains that there are a lot of puppies in my home.

use: used for expressing ownership of the money
hanzi: 我  有  钱。
explanation: explains that i have money.

use: asking politely to enter
hanzi: 请  进 。
explanation: explains that please come in.

use: asking what something is called
hanzi: 那 个  叫  什么？
explanation: explains that what is that called?

use: stating someone's name
hanzi: 我们 的 老板  叫  John。
explanation: explains that our boss is named john.

use: expressing that we are going to a park
hanzi: 我们 现在  去  公园。
explanation: explains that we're going to the park now.

use: expressing motion towards a place
hanzi: 我  去  工作 。
explanation: explains that i'm going to work.

use: express that an action is going to happen
hanzi: 我们  去  吃饭 吧 。
explanation: explains that let's go eat.

use: Used to ask if someone is able to do something
hanzi: 你们  能  小声 一点 吗？
pinyin: Nǐmen  néng  xiǎo shēng yīdiǎn ma
explanation: explains that could you all lower your voices a bit?

use: expressing an ability to learn chinese
hanzi: 他  会  说 中文。
explanation: explains that he can speak chinese.

use: used for expressing an ability to write chinese
hanzi: 我  会  写 汉字。
explanation: explains that i can write chinese characters.

use: used to express what will happen
hanzi: 他  会  来 看 你 吗？
pinyin: Tā  huì  lái kàn nǐ ma
explanation: explains that will he come to see you?

use: used to express what will happen
hanzi: 你 女儿  会  听 你 的 话。
pinyin: Nǐ nǚér  huì  tīng nǐ de huà
explanation: explains that your daughter will listen to you.

use: used to express wanting to eat noodles
hanzi: 我  想   吃  面。
explanation: explains that i would like to eat noodles.

use: asking about how something is done
hanzi: 你  怎么  知道 我 喜欢 旅行？
pinyin: Nǐ  zěnme  zhīdào wǒ xǐhuan lǚxíng
explanation: explains that how did you know i like to travel?

use: used to ask how eating mangoes is done
hanzi: 芒果   怎么  吃？
explanation: explains that how do you eat mangos?

use: expresses where I went to college
hanzi: 我  在   上海  上大学。
explanation: explains that i went to college in shanghai.

use: used to say that I didn't go to work
hanzi: 我  没有  去 上班。
explanation: explains that i didn't go to work.

use: used to say that I am a student
hanzi: 我  是  学生。
explanation: explains that i am a student.

use: used to say that there is too much rice
hanzi: 米饭  太  多  了  。
explanation: explains that there is too much rice.

use: used to connect "good" to "I"
hanzi: 我  很  好。
explanation: explains that i'm good.

use: used to ask how much a phone costs
hanzi: 你 的 手机  多少 钱 ？
explanation: explains that how much was your cell phone?

use: used for expressing specific quantities of money
hanzi: 两  块  五  毛
explanation: explains that two kuai five mao (2.5)

structure: subject + verb + 几 + measure word + noun
use: used to ask about the quantity of children
hanzi: 他 有  几  个 孩子？
explanation: explains that how many kids does he have?

structure: subject + verb + 多少 + measure word + noun
use: used to express the number of countries
hanzi: 你 去 过  多少  个 国家？
pinyin: Nǐ qù guo  duōshao  gè guójiā
explanation: explains that how many countries have you been to?

use: used to ask how someone is
hanzi: 你 最近  怎么样  ？
explanation: explains that how have you been recently?

use: used to ask how china is
hanzi: 中国  怎么样  ？
explanation: explains that how is china?

use: ask about whether dinner was eaten
hanzi: 你 吃饭  了 吗  ？
explanation: explains that did you eat?

structure: subject + 是 + manner + 去 + 的
use: used to emphasize how someone got somewhere
hanzi: A  我  是   坐 火车  去  的  。
pinyin: Wǒ  shì   zuò huǒchē  qù  de
explanation: explains that i went by train.

structure: subject + 是 + time + verb + 的
use: used to emphasize what time something was done
hanzi: B  我们  是   昨天  到  的  。
explanation: explains that we arrived yesterday.

structure: subject + 是 + 在 + vplace + verb + 的
use: used to emphasize where something was done
hanzi: B  我  是   在 香港  出生  的  。
pinyin: Wǒ  shì   zài Xiānggǎng  chūshēng  de
explanation: explains that i was born in hong kong.

structure: subject + 不是 + 跟 + person + verb + 的
use: used to emphasize with whom something did not happen
hanzi: 他  不是   跟 我们 一起  去  的  。
pinyin: Tā  bù shì   gēn wǒmen  yīqǐ  qù  de
explanation: explains that he didn't go with us.
